title: Crafted The Art of the Taco
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Taco and beer restaurant with seating for around 20. Offers vegan taco fillings including potato, fried tofu, black beans, falafel, seitan, and vegan cheese (house made, nutritional yeast base). Staff knows what vegan means. Operates other Crafted restaurants in Greensboro - see webpage.
